title: I was really excited for the new champ select, then i had a terrible thought.
body:
My god the smurfs are going to ruin my bronze experience more than they already do.

Like the elo im at smurfs are so bloody common i just went up against the same smurf twice in a period of like 5 games, so we can rule out them smurfing two games in a row, hes been at it for about 5 hours.

The sheer horror of a group of friends smurfing bronze with 3 b5 accounts is just, if there wasnt an elo hell before the community is gonna make one now.

replies.body:
Smurfs can be annoying, but there's so much you can learn form them. Next time you get matched with one, look at how he lanes, roams and exploits the mistakes of bronze players.

I don't think you'll encounter too many 3 man smurf teams ether. The elo system is very good, it will only take about 3 - 4 games before they are playing at Bronze 1 to Silver 5 elo.

Most of the smurfs in this elo are just dicks man, all they do is roam and one shot you with their superior gold because naturally they farm way better than you and dont miss their skill shots, and then call you shit so you go on tilt and die even more, like nothing special, just lots of niddalees or ap shacos, or other burst damage champs where they can just drive by you, rengars a popular one too.

ive gone against maybe one decent person who smurfs, and he added me after the game because i managed to first blood him, but thats it, just the one.

It sucks I know, I've been in that situation before :(

Most of the smurfs will be Silver and Gold elo players who think they are the shit. But if you're finding it hard to keep up on CS with them, you might want to consider joining our CS practices me and a few in-game friends have.

Just a series of games that we do a few times a week in custom games to brush up on CS. It's helped me quite a bit. Feel free to add me if you're interested.

Dude id love that just dont judge im bronze as fuck haha.

Sent you a request in game btw.
Do you just complain on the forums exploiting every problem with no solution?
There is no solutions to smurfs, unless you would like to ban them for smufing? no? ok cool dont complain about me complaining.
